channel.title: Web design requests
channel.description:
Hi all :)
I've got a week vacation right now, and i know i'm gonna be bored, so maybe people here need a website, which i could make? :) I can do it in html (mainly) and if you need some scripts, i'll make some php scripts. The way i normally make layouts for people is like the way they send me a picture (paint?) how they want it, like here's the menu, there's the header etc. Just say a bit how you want it, and it'll be finished in no-time.
By 'best' project so far is http://www.emiles-site.tk. Still not finshed, but i don't update anymore hehe :)
Pricing will be very cheap, mainly depending on the amount of work i have to do. A default website will be around $15, transfered with paypal :)
Any people i can make happy with this? :) ~S!ms

item.title: Web design requests
item.dc:creator: @S_ms S!ms
